t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Grady's Cold Brew, Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate, Original Flavor, Cold Brew Kit with 12 (2oz.) Bean Bags plus 1 Pour and Store Pouch, New Orleans Style Cold Brew Concentrate, 36 Total Servings
s: Been using the Grady's Pour and Store kit for a few years now. Pricing works out much better than buying my cold brew at the local coffee shop, flavor is just as good if not better, and I get to make it exactly how I like it. I usually add about an extra cup of water per batch and it gives me the right flavor/ratio every time. ... I cannot tolerate caffeine and this is one of the only brands ...
